title: Wizard's Menagerie Adventure #13
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Creature Holding Pens
rooms.description: A large chamber filled with enchanted cages housing magical creatures. Soft glowing crystals provide light. You hear the chirping of a phoenix, the gentle snoring of a sleeping dragon hatchling, and the soft neighing of a unicorn. The air smells of hay, magic, and exotic creature musk. A heavy wooden door leads north.

items.name: creature supply cabinet
items.description: A tall wooden cabinet with three drawers containing feeding supplies and care equipment

items.name: creature feeding schedule
items.description: A parchment listing feeding times for the magical creatures
items.text: FEEDING SCHEDULE: Phoenix - 3 fireberries at dawn. Dragon hatchling - 5 gemstones at noon. Unicorn - 7 moonflowers at dusk. Remember these sacred numbers: 3, 5, 7.

items.name: brass cage key
items.description: A small brass key with a phoenix feather charm attached

items.name: phoenix cage
items.description: An ornate golden cage containing a magnificent phoenix with crimson and gold plumage

items.name: enchanted phoenix feather
items.description: A glowing feather that radiates warmth and magical energy

items.name: dragon hatchling nest
items.description: A nest of soft blankets where a small dragon sleeps peacefully

items.name: wizard's research note
items.description: A hastily scribbled note from the wizard
items.text: Research Log: The apprentice Merrick must feed the creatures daily. My name is Archmage Aldric Thornweave. The Celestial Sanctum holds my most precious creation - the Orb of Eternal Light. Only those who know the creatures' sacred numbers may enter my study.

items.name: unicorn stall
items.description: A pristine white stall where a silver unicorn stands gracefully

items.name: enchanted silver horseshoe
items.description: A horseshoe that glimmers with protective magic

items.name: reinforced oak door
items.description: A sturdy door leading to the wizard's study, sealed with a magical lock

rooms.name: Wizard's Study
rooms.description: A circular tower room filled with towering bookshelves, bubbling potions, and floating spell books. Star charts cover the ceiling, and a large crystal ball sits on an ornate desk. Magical artifacts line the walls. A shimmering portal frame stands against the far wall, currently inactive. The scent of old parchment and incense fills the air.

items.name: ancient spell book collection
items.description: A shelf containing leather-bound spell books with glowing runes

items.name: Compendium of Magical Creatures
items.description: A comprehensive guide to magical creature care and lore
items.text: Chapter 7: The phoenix represents rebirth and renewal. Chapter 12: Dragons are guardians of ancient treasure. Chapter 19: Unicorns symbolize purity and grace. The apprentice Merrick tends to all creatures with dedication.

items.name: ornate wizard's desk
items.description: A massive desk carved with mystical symbols, containing multiple locked compartments

items.name: apprentice's journal
items.description: A journal belonging to the wizard's apprentice
items.text: Day 47: Master Aldric has entrusted me with the menagerie. I am Merrick, proud apprentice. The Celestial Sanctum is where he keeps the Orb of Eternal Light. To enter, one must answer: Who is the master? Who tends the creatures? Where is the Orb kept?

items.name: glowing portal crystal
items.description: A crystal that pulses with dimensional energy, needed to activate the portal

items.name: divination crystal ball
items.description: A large crystal ball showing swirling mists and visions
items.text: The crystal ball shows a vision: A magnificent chamber bathed in golden light, with the Orb of Eternal Light floating above a pedestal. This is the Celestial Sanctum, the wizard's greatest achievement.

items.name: shelf of magical potions
items.description: Glass bottles containing colorful, bubbling liquids

items.name: potion of invisibility
items.description: A shimmering silver potion that makes the drinker invisible

items.name: inactive portal frame
items.description: An ornate archway covered in runes. Three questions are inscribed on a plaque beside it.

password_questions.question: Who is the master of this menagerie?
password_questions.hint: Check the wizard's research note in the creature pens

password_questions.question: Who tends to the creatures?
password_questions.hint: Look for information about the apprentice

password_questions.question: Where is the Orb of Eternal Light kept?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention where the wizard's greatest creation is stored

rooms.name: Celestial Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the wizard's most sacred chamber! The room is bathed in radiant golden light emanating from a floating orb above a crystal pedestal. Constellations swirl across the domed ceiling, and the walls shimmer with pure magical energy. The Orb of Eternal Light pulses with power, illuminating ancient runes that spell out words of completion and mastery. A shimmering exit portal leads to freedom.

items.name: Orb of Eternal Light
items.description: A magnificent sphere of pure magical energy that radiates warmth, light, and infinite power

items.name: crystal pedestal
items.description: A pedestal of flawless crystal supporting the legendary orb

items.name: glowing wall runes
items.description: Magical runes that tell the story of the wizard's greatest achievement
items.text: These runes speak of Archmage Aldric Thornweave's life work: the creation of the Orb of Eternal Light, a source of infinite magical energy. Only those worthy enough to reach this sanctum may bask in its glory and claim mastery over the menagerie.

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the Wizard's Menagerie and reached the Celestial Sanctum! The Orb of Eternal Light recognizes your worthiness and grants you its blessing. Magical energy flows through you as the creatures in the menagerie below sing in harmony. You have proven yourself a true master of magical creatures and wizardry. You win!
